headline: 1 Profitable Stock on Our Watchlist and 2 We Question
summary: Even if a company is profitable, it doesn’t always mean it’s a great investment. Some struggle to maintain growth, face looming threats, or fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their future potential.

headline: Is Colgate-Palmolive Fairly Priced After Recent 3% Share Price Drop?
summary: Wondering if Colgate-Palmolive at around $77 a share is still a safe staple or a quietly mispriced opportunity? You are not alone. This is exactly the kind of stock where valuation really matters. Over the last week the stock slipped about 3.0%, but it is still up 6.6% over three years, hinting at a slow growing compounder that investors rotate into and out of as sentiment shifts. Recently, the market has been weighing Colgate-Palmolive's push into higher margin oral care lines and...
